page.title: 17People At Play
page.content: Most of the people resident in this area have lived here many years and are of the older age group.These older people use several clubs in nearby areas where they meet to chat, play dominoes , bingo or have lunch. People in the middle aged group who have lived in the area for some time tend to enjoy leisure activities at home or near their own homes.They enjoy gardening,reading,hockey,cricket football and shooting.There is a trout pool at Aldersey and many children and adults fish in local pits.A few newcomers to the area go further away for their leisure activities. Darts,Bingo and Computer games occupy many people but perhaps most time is spent watching television. Our children attend cubs and brownie groups in nearby villages.
